outline:
1. to kill, slaughter, beat
    1. (Qal)
      1. to slaughter
        1. beast for food
        2. sacrifice
        3. person in human sacrifice
        4. beaten, hammered (of shekels)
      2. (Niphal) to be slaughtered, be slain (of food or sacrifice)
    2. (BDB) slaughtering
      1. word doubtful
kjv_def: kill, offer, shoot out, slay, slaughter.
